publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2540 Trish Godman: Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry—That the Parliament warmly commends the crew of the Caledonian MacBrayne ferry "Caledonian Isles", their shorebased colleagues and members of the Glasgow and West of Scotland Maritime Careers Group for their active participation in recent promotional events designed to raise schoolchildren’s awareness of career opportunities in the Scottish maritime industry and believes that such recruitment initiatives will be of considerable importance to the industry and to Scottish school leavers who are keen to engage in satisfying and worthwhile careers both afloat and ashore.
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Michael Russell*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-2540 Trish Godman: Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry-That the Parliament warmly commends the crew of the Caledonian MacBrayne ferry "Caledonian Isles", their shorebased colleagues and members of the Glasgow and West of Scotland Maritime Careers Group for their active participation in recent promotional events designed to raise schoolchildren's awareness of career opportunities in the Scottish maritime industry and believes that such recruitment initiatives will be of considerable importance to the industry and to Scottish school leavers who are keen to engage in satisfying and worthwhile careers both afloat and ashore. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Johann Lamont*, Alex Neil*, Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Cathy Peattie*, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2540 Career Opportunities in the Scottish Maritime Industry (lodged on 11 December 2001) Donald Gorrie*
